faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about getting started

questions.question: How quickly can I get started?
questions.answer: Most customers are up and running in less than 5 minutes. Product 0 is cloud-based and requires no hardware installation - just connect your monitoring equipment and you're ready to go.

questions.question: Is Product 0 really free forever?
questions.answer: Yes! Product 0 includes real-time monitoring, compliance reports, and alerts at no cost. You can upgrade to Product 1 anytime to add AI forecasting capabilities.

questions.question: What equipment do I need?
questions.answer: Voltry works with standard power quality meters and monitoring equipment. We support all major brands and can help you choose the right equipment if you're just getting started.

questions.question: How accurate are the AI predictions?
questions.answer: Product 1's AI forecasting achieves 95% accuracy with a Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) of just 4.7%. Our federated learning approach continuously improves predictions across our network.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Product 1's federated learning ensures your raw data never leaves your facility. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant.

questions.question: Can I try Product 1 before committing?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day free trial of Product 1 with no credit card required. Experience the full power of AI forecasting risk-free.
